00045   #define List  false
00046   #define Atom  true
00047   
00048   struct Form
00049   {
00050     bool        Tag;
00051     string      Value;
00052     Form*       Car;
00053     Form*       Cdr;
00054     long line;
00055     int column;
00056     ~Form()
00057     {
00058       delete Car; delete Cdr;
00059     }
00060   };
00061   
00062   #define val(x)        (x->Value)
00063   #define tag(x)        (x->Tag)
00064   #define isatom(x)     (tag(x) == Atom)
00065   #define islist(x)     (tag(x) == List)
00066   #define car(x)        (x->Car)
00067   #define cdr(x)        (x->Cdr)
00068   #define cadr(x)       (car(cdr(x)))
00069   #define cddr(x)       (cdr(cdr(x)))
00070

00114   struct Variable
00115   {
00116     string sym;
00117     bool constant;
00118     bool argument;
00119   };
00120   
00121   typedef map<string,Variable> Scope;
00122   typedef vector<Scope> ST;
00123   ST SymbolTable;
00124   #define ScopeDepth SymbolTable.size()-1
00125   
00126   #define error_unbound(x)        \
00127   printf("ERROR:Symbol '%s' is unbound.",print(x).c_str()); \
00128   Unwind();
00129   
00130   string* lookup(string in)
00131   {
00132     for(long i = ScopeDepth; i != -1; i--)
00133     {
00134       map<string,Variable>::iterator seeker = SymbolTable[i].find(in);
00135       if(seeker != SymbolTable[i].end())
00136         return &seeker->second.sym;
00137     }
00138     return NULL;
00139   }

00141   unsigned long tmp_version = -1;
00142   unsigned long res_version = -1;
00143   unsigned long label_version = -1;
00144   unsigned long string_version = -1;
00145   unsigned long array_version = -1;
00146   
00147   string cutlast(string in)
00148   {
00149     return string(in,0,in.length()-1);
00150   }

00152   /*
00153    * TEMPORARY REGISTERS
00154    */
00155   
00156   inline string get_unique_tmp()
00157   {
00158     return "%tmp.version" + to_string(++tmp_version);
00159   }
00160   
00161   inline string get_tmp(long long int v)
00162   {
00163     return "%tmp.version" + to_string(v);
00164   }
00165   
00166   inline string get_current_tmp(){ return get_tmp(tmp_version);}
00167   
00168   /*
00169    * RESULT REGISTERS
00170    */
00171   
00172   string get_unique_res(string type)
00173   {
00174     string vnum = to_string(++res_version);
00175     SymbolTable[ScopeDepth]["%res.version" + vnum].sym = type;
00176     return "%res.version" + vnum;
00177   }
00178   
00179   inline string get_res(long v)
00180   {
00181     return "%res.version" + to_string(v);
00182   }
00183   
00184   string res_type(string name)
00185   {
00186     string* tmp = lookup(name);
00187     if(tmp == NULL)
00188     { error("Can't find the register '",name,"'."); }
00189     return *tmp;
00190   }
00191   
00192   inline string get_current_res(){ return get_res(res_version);}
00193

00195    * LABELS

00197   
00198   string get_unique_label()
00199   {
00200     return "%label.version" + to_string(label_version++);
00201   }
00202   
00203   string get_label(long long int v)
00204   {
00205     return "%label.version" + to_string(v);
00206   }
00207   
00208   inline string get_current_label(){ return get_label(label_version);}

00210   #define allocate(address,type)                \
00211   (string)address + " = alloca " + type + "\n"
00212   #define store(type,value,address)             \
00213   (string)"store " + type + " " + value + ", " + type + "* " + address + "\n"
00214   #define load(to,type,source)                  \
00215   (string)to + " = load " + type + "* " + source
00216   
00217   #define latest_type()   res_type(get_current_res())
00218   
00219   void dump_scope(unsigned long s)
00220   {
00221     for(map<string,Variable>::iterator i = SymbolTable[s].begin();
00222         i != SymbolTable[s].end(); i++)
00223     {
00224       printf("\n %s : %s",i->first.c_str(),i->second.sym.c_str());
00225     }
00226   }

00228   vector<string> CodeStack;
00229   
00230   inline void push(string in)
00231   {
00232     CodeStack.push_back(in);
00233   }

00241   string emitCode(Form* form)
00242   {
00243     string out;
00244     if(form == NULL)
00245       error("Can't emit code for the null form ().");
00246     else if(isatom(form))
00247     {
00248       switch(analyze(val(form)))
00249       {
00250         case BooleanTrue:
00251         {
00252           out = allocate(get_unique_tmp(),"i1");
00253           out += store("i1","1",get_current_tmp());
00254           out += load(get_unique_res("i1"),"i1",get_current_tmp());
00255           break;
00256         }
00257         case BooleanFalse:
00258         {
00259           out = allocate(get_unique_tmp(),"i1");
00260           out += store("i1","0",get_current_tmp());
00261           out += load(get_unique_res("i1"),"i1",get_current_tmp());
00262           break;
00263         }
00264         case Integer:
00265         {
00266           out = allocate(get_unique_tmp(),"i64");
00267           out += store("i64",val(form),get_current_tmp());
00268           out += load(get_unique_res("i64"),"i64",get_current_tmp());
00269           break;
00270         }
00271         case Real:
00272         {
00273           out = allocate(get_unique_tmp(),"double");
00274           out += store("double",val(form),get_current_tmp());
00275           out += load(get_unique_res("double"),"double",get_current_tmp());
00276           break;
00277         }
00278         case Symbol:
00279         {
00280           /*map<string,string>::iterator seeker;
00281           string sym = val(form);
00282           string tmp;
00283           string type;
00284           for(long i = ScopeDepth; i != -1; i--)
00285           {
00286             seeker = SymbolTable[i].find(sym);
00287             if(seeker != SymbolTable[i].end())
00288             {
00289               type = seeker->second;
00290               tmp = sym + to_string<long>(i);
00291               out = load(get_unique_res(type),type,"%"+tmp);
00292             }
00293           }
00294           string* tmp = lookup(val(form));
00295           if(tmp != NULL)
00296             out = load(get_unique_res(val(form)),val(form),"%"+val(form));
00297           else
00298             error_unbound(val(form));
00299           break;*/
00300           string sym = val(form);
00301           string* tmp = lookup(sym);
00302           if(tmp == NULL)
00303           {
00304             error_unbound(form);
00305           }
00306           else
00307             out = load(get_unique_res(*tmp),*tmp,"%"+sym+to_string(ScopeDepth));
00308           break;
00309         }
00310         case Character:
00311         {
00312           string c = string(val(form),1,val(form).length()-2);
00313           string address = "@str" + to_string<unsigned long>(++string_version);
00314           out = allocate(get_unique_tmp(),"i8");
00315           push(address + " = global [2 x i8] c\"" + c + "\0\0\"");
00316           out += get_unique_tmp() + " = load i8* getelementptr inbounds ([2 x i8]* " + address + ", i32 0, i64 0)";
00317           out += store("i8",get_current_tmp(),get_tmp(tmp_version-1));
00318           out += load(get_unique_res("i8"),"i8",get_current_tmp());
00319           break;
00320         }
00321         case String:
00322         {
00323           //Remember strings come with their double quotes at the end
00324           string str = cutlast(string(val(form),1));
00325           long length = str.length()-1;
00326           string type = "[" + to_string<long>(length) + " x i8]";
00327           push("@str" + to_string<unsigned long>(++string_version) + " = global " + type + " c\"" + str + "\\0A\\00\"");
00328           out = get_unique_res(type) + " = getelementptr " + type + "* @str" + to_string<unsigned long>(string_version) + ", i64 0, i64 0";
00329           break;
00330         }
00331       }
00332     }
00333     else
00334     {
00335       if(islist(car(form)))
00336         error("Lists can't be used as function names in calls. Until I implement lambda.",at(form));
00337       string func = val(car(form));
00338       map<string,hFuncPtr>::iterator seeker = Core.find(func);
00339       if(seeker != Core.end())
00340         out = seeker->second(form);
00341       else
00342         out = callFunction(func,cdr(form));
00343     }
00344     return out+"\n";
00345   }
00346   
00347   string Compile(Form* form)
00348   {
00349     string out;
00350     string tmp;
00351     if(form == NULL)
00352       error("Can't emit code for the null form.");
00353     else if(isatom(form))
00354     {
00355       out = emitCode(form);
00356     }
00357     else
00358     {
00359       if(islist(car(form)))
00360         error("Lists can't be used as function names in calls. Until I implement lambda.",at(form));
00361       string func = val(car(form));
00362       map<string,hFuncPtr>::iterator seeker = TopLevel.find(func);
00363       if(seeker != TopLevel.end())
00364       {
00365         push(seeker->second(form));
00366         out += emitCode(readString("true"));
00367       }
00368       else
00369       {
00370         seeker = Core.find(func);
00371         if(seeker != Core.end())
00372           out = seeker->second(form);
00373         else
00374           out = callFunction(func,cdr(form));
00375       }
00376     }
00377     for(unsigned long i = 0; i < CodeStack.size(); i++)
00378       tmp += CodeStack[i] + "\n";
00379     out = "define " + latest_type() + " @entry(){\n" + out + "\nret " + latest_type() + " " + get_current_res() + "\n}";
00380     out = tmp + out;
00381     CodeStack.clear();
00382     return out;
00383   }

00396   void init()
00397   {
00398     //InitializeNativeTarget();
00399     //Program = new Module("Hylas Lisp",Context);
00400     master.allow_RedefineMacros = true;
00401     master.allow_RedefineFunctions = false;
00402     master.output = plain;
00403     init_stdlib();
00404     init_types();
00405     init_optimizer();
00406     //Engine =  EngineBuilder(Program).create();
00407   }
